ActDescription: A certain Francesco Foglietta rents out the labour promised by the former Bulgarian slave Erena, who had been declared free by the sindicatores and had agreed to a term of service, to a certain Margarita de Castro, for --- years and --- lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 3, series I, nr. 297
ActDescription: A certain Nicolosia de Campomorono rents the Russian slave Maria, who is 32 years of age, to the notary Battista Stella, for 10 years and 80 lire.

actTitle: Abazia di San Siro 1316–1653, entry dated 1387-10-02
ActDescription: A certain Giovannina de Vigono, widow of Valente de Valente, leases out the Albanian slave Giorgio, who is 28 years of age, and his son, Andrea, who is 8 years of age, to a certain Domenico Ricci, for 8 and 12 years, respectively, and for 40 lire. At the end of the contract they are to be freed.

actTitle: Abazia di San Siro 1316–1653, entry dated 1387-10-02
ActDescription: A certain Giovannina de Vigono, widow of Valente de Valente, leases out the Albanian slave Giorgio, who is 28 years of age, and his son, Andrea, who is 8 years of age, to a certain Domenico Ricci, for 8 and 12 years, respectively, and for 40 lire. At the end of the contract they are to be freed.

A certain Argentina de Fravega leases out the --- slave Cristina, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Giorgio de Rocha, bancalarius, for 5 years and 10 lire/year. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Pellegro de Camulio, draperius, leases out the Tartaran slave ---, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Agostino de Andoria, for 4 years and 30 lire.

A certain Fabiano di San Michele leases out the Tartaran slave Maddalena, who is --- years of age, and que habet lactem, to a certain Giovani Canale for 4 years and 40 lire. Epstein (SS, p. 136) notes the proximity to the median price of 60 lire for an enslaved famle around this time.

actTitle: Andrea Testa, filza 2, series III, nr. 88
ActDescription: A certain Bernardo de Capriata returns to Battista de Santo Nazario a female slave that had been leased to him for wet-nursing (post locatio).

actTitle: Antonio de Bonizo, filza 1, series I, nr. 127
ActDescription: The deed describes that  the heirs of the cutler Lorenzo Spotorno loaned the Circassian slave Luna to the Ospedale de Scalo, represented by the cutler Bertone di Lavagna, for 80 lire and a period of 12 years. The slave was guaranteed «nitidam sanam et ab omnibus et vitiis magagnis occultis et manifestis.»

actTitle: Branca Bagnara, filza 5, series II, nr. 80
ActDescription: A certain Oberto de Sancta Agnete, bancalarus, leases out the --- slave Luchina, who is 14 years of age, to a certain Andrea de Petra, lanerius, for 8 years and 31 lire.

actTitle: Gregorio Labaino, filza 6, series I, nr. 97
ActDescription: A certain Bartolomeo de Insulahona, accimator, leases out the --- slave Giorgetto, who is 21 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo de Petra, accimator, for 5 years and 45 lire.

actTitle: Niccolò Garumbero, filza 1, series III, item dated 1432-11-21
ActDescription: A certain Bartolomeo Bosco, lawyer, leases out the Abkhazan slave Calì, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Agostino de Pinu, for 4 years and 35 lire.
A certain Giovanni Lanzapango, mersarius, leases out the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Antonio de Recho, for a period of 6 years and 36L 5s.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 13, series II, nr. 223
ActDescription: A certain Niccolò Pellegrino sartore rents out the Russian slave Anastasia, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Rolando Axillo, for 7 years at a cost of 53 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 2, series II, nr. 149
ActDescription: A certain mercante alemano Giacomo de Andoia rents out (locatio) the Hungarian slave Margherita, who is 34 years of age, to a certain Giacomo Frassineto, for 5 years and 44 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 19, series II, nr. 303
ActDescription: A certain Blasio de Bargono rents out the Russian slave Anna, who is 50 years of age, to a certain Giacomo Solario, faber, for 3 years at a cost of 35 lire.

A certain Girolamo de Camulio, the bishop of Chios, leases out the Albanian slave Anna, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Bernardo Alesio, peliparius, for 4 years and 30 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed. (a form of locatio contract).

actTitle: Giacomo Rondanina, filza 5, series II, nr. 71
ActDescription: A certain Giovanni de Clavaro leases the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Antonio Carrega, for 11 years and 150 lire.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 14, series I, nr. 65
ActDescription: A certain Giovanni de Davania, formaggiaio, leases the Russian slave Marta, who is 28 years of age, to the notary Pietro Grosso, for 5 years and 100 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 13, series II, nr. 257
ActDescription: A certain Matteo de Davania leases the Russian slave Maria, who is 30 years of age, to Battista Costa, for 8 years and 100 lire. At the completion of the contract she is to be freed.

A certain Raffaele della Spezia, civis Ianue, leases out the --- slave Maria who is --- years of age, to a certain Egidio Merello, for 30 soldi per month. She is leased for the purpose of wet-nursing. The contract alllows for Egidio to terminate the lease at the end of each month.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 5, series I, nr. 122
ActDescription: A quittance between Giovanni de Mulasana, calzolarius, and Gabriele Biscotto, corrigiarius, for two slaves who been exchanged between them. One of them, Lucia, is col latte and who is now said to be pregnant. The --- slave Lucia, who is --- years of age, is leased out by Giovanni de Mulasana for pro alomna for 40 lire (locatio).
A certain Giovanni Stachino rents the Hungarian slave Melica, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Ambrogio Carrega, for 15 years at a cost of 125 lire.

Bartolomeo de Vulturo, remolarius, leases out the Circassian slave Maddalena, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Raffaele dello Torre, for 3 years and 55 lire. She is lease come balia and with the agreement that she may be returned if she is not able to produce milk for wet-nursing.

A certain Stefano Braccelli, chancellor, leases out the Moorish slave Francisca, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Girolamo de Porta, for 5 years and 50 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed. Paried with item nr. 467.

actTitle: Andrea Medianotte, filza 1, series I, nr. 85
ActDescription: A certain Domenico Merello leases the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Agostino Gropallo, for 10 years and 60 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Lorenzo Costa, filza 6, series I, nr. 325
ActDescription: A certain Matteo Vivolo leases out the Abkhazan slave Cita, who is --- years of age, to a certain Giraforte Costa, calzolaio, for 10 years and 90 lire. At the end of her service she is to be freed.

actTitle: Narino Montaldo, filza 1, series II, nr. 88
ActDescription: Giacomo di San Salvatore leases to Pietro de Pluma, a cheesemaker, his household servant (fantesca) Lucia, as a wet-nurse for three years and for 60 lire.

A certain Antonio Carrega rents out (sublets) the Hungarian slave Maddalena, whose age is not indicated and whom he had rented for 6 years and 8 months, to a certain shoemaker Bartolomeo de Zino, for 50 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 1, series II, nr. 36
ActDescription: A certain Terruccio de Terrucio rents the Russian slave Maria, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Antonio de Varcio, barberius, for 3 years and 36 lire.
A certain Battista de Benisia leases the Circassian slave Divizia, who is 22 years of age, slave to a certain Lodisio Darfino, accimator, for 6 years and 70 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 2, series I, nr. 273
ActDescription: A certain Lucano de Marini and Lodisio de Rocheta q. Cristoforo rents out the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 17 years of age, to a certain barber Giacomo de Bonis de Cassano q. Pietro, for 13 years and 95 lire.

A certain notary Egidio Sacherio rents out the Tartaran slave Lucia, who is 30 years of age, to the silk maker Giovanni de Sancto Salvatore, for the purposes of being a wet nurse, for one year at a cost of 20 lire.
A certain Bartolomeo de Monsia, setaiolo, rents out the Greek slave Maria, who is 28 years old, to a certain Angelo de Zerbis, setaiolo, for 3 years and 30 lire.
A certain Tommaso Marello, culterius, rents out the Bulgarian slave Maria, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Alegrino Gato, stagnarius, for 6 years and 50 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 7, series I, nr. 103
ActDescription: A certain Giacomo Mezano rents out the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Jonato, faber, for 9 years at a price of 56 lire.
A certain Girolamo Navone leases out the --- slave Margherita, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Enrico Tonso, for 15 years and 150 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 1, series I, nr. 66
ActDescription: The innkeeper Niccolò Montanaro q. Ardisone loans the slave Maria, 35 years old, to a certain Bartolomeo Costa for 5 years and 37 lire. This might have occured on the property of Matteo Lomellini. Read further! The contract mentions clothing.
A certain Ottobono Balbi, draperius, rents out the Tartaran slave Marta, who is 38 years of age, for six years at 8 lire per year, to a certain Francesco Caito.

actTitle: Quirico de Albingana, filza 1, series III, nr. 70
ActDescription: A certain Giovanni de Fo sub-leases the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 45 years of age, from a certain Tommaso de Bessignano, for 3 years and 32 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 2, series I, nr. 11
ActDescription: In this deed, a certain Silvestro de Corverio rents out the Circassian slave Margherita, who is 45 years of age, to a certain draper Girolamo Calvi, for 6 years and 37 lire, 10 soldi. Both the dating and numbering are tenative, awaiting verification.

hName: The nuns of the monastery of San Sepolcro di Sampierdarena
ActDescription: The nuns of the monastery of the Santo Sepolcro di Sampierdarena lease out the --- slave Margarita, who is --- years of age, to a certain Giovanni Ricci, lanerius, for 6 years and 12 lire. The slave, formerly belonging to Agostino de Mari, was purchased at public auction by the representative of the monastery Cristiano Spinola .
A certain Bartolomeo da Valenza, imponerius, leases the Circassian slave Maddalena, who is 36 years of age, to a certain Tommaso da Roma, magister scholarum, for 6 years and 48 lire.
A certain Dexerino da Piacenza leases out the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 22 years of age, to a certain Antonio de Vultabio, for 8 years and 40 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Matteo de Nigrono, a merchant from Milan, of the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 24 years of age, to the notary Guirardo Brevei, for 7 years and 55 lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 1, series II, nr. 222
ActDescription: A certain Cosma Goffredo, from Nice, rents out the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 31 years of age, to a certain banker named Bartolomeo Regio, for two years at a cost of 24 lire.
A certain Benigno de Cassina leases out the Moorish slave Maria, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Mariola Prezenda, for 10 years and 120 lire. After the lease is ended she is to be freed.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 17, series I, nr. 55
ActDescription: A certain Francesco Maruffo leases out the Abkhazan slave Margherita, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Paolina de Regio, for 12 years and 125 lire.

A certain Pellegro Tarigo leases out the Albanian slave Elena, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Nicolosia de Dernisio, for 8 years and 100 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be free. The date is approximate.
A certain Pietro Facori leases out the slave Anna, who is 24 years of age and of unspecified ethnicity, to a certain Tommaso di Roma, magister scholarum in Genua, for 60 lire and 3 years, pro alumna.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 6, series I, nr. 198
ActDescription: A certain Agostino Boto, apothecary, rents out the Circassian slave Maddalena, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Antonio de Ferrari, for 1 year at a cost of 12 lire.
A certain Benigno Cosina leases out the Moorish slave Maria, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Cristoforo Leardo, for 10 years and 120 lire.

actTitle: Oberto Foglietta, filza 5, series I, nr. 104

ActDescription: A certain Girolamo di Rapallo, son of Giovanni, leases out the Russian slave Maria, who is — years of age, to a certain Antonio Semenza, son of Cristoforo, faber, for 3 years and 20 lire. She is leased pro nutrice and under certain conditions. That is, the sum should be paid out in annual installments; Antonio wanted to ensure that Maria still had enough milk for his son in her third year. In return, he also sent a slave named Caterina to the house of Girolamo, which cost 11 lire per year estimated to be that of the 20 lire were to be deducted; see Epstein, Speaking, p. 137.
A certain Michele de Turrilia loans the Circassian slave Margherita, who is 25-years old, to a certain Agostino Boto, speciarius, for 1 year and 100 lire.

actTitle: Giovanni Valdettaro, filza 1, series I, nr. 10
ActDescription: A certain Ambrosio Palomario leases out the Russian slave Lucia, who is --- years of age, to a certain Giovanni de Dimitrio, for 20 years and 120 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Tommaso de Franchis rents out the --- slave Giorgio, who is 23 years of age, to a certain Battista Leardo, for 5 years at a cost of 42 lire.

actTitle: Paolo de Recco, filza 5, series II, nr. ---
ActDescription: A certain Gabriele Marcono leases the Russian slave Anna, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Gregorio Stella, for 1 year (?) and 11 lire.

actTitle: Ambrogio Fasciolo, register 1, volume II, 1333–1415, fol. 161r
ActDescription: A certain Benedetto Fieschi rents out the Tartaran slave Maddalena, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Giacomo de Camulio, for 5 years and 26 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 1, series II, nr. 27
ActDescription: A certain Donato Bondinario leases out the enslaved Russian named Caterina, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Marcheto de Pelegro, for 8 years and 56 Genoese lire. The lease contains an exception to the health clause that mentions mark or cyst in her eye. The contract was extracted.
A certain Giuliano Maruffo leases the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Andrea de Ferrari, for 4 years and 45 lire.

A certain Isabella, widow of Raffaele di Negro, promised to lease out the Tartaran slave Margarita, who is 22 years of age, to certain Tommaso Naste, notarius, for 2 years and 24 lire. The form of the contract is based on that of a typical “accordatio famulas”; in addition, it was agreed that Thomas could sublet the slave if she ran out of milk within the two years.  beginning, the word famula has been deleted and replaced by alumpna; the abbreviated additional stipulation is: que si caret lac sit super dictum Thomam et dictus Thomas pro dictis duobus annis locari posit eum quibus voluIserit.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 13, series I, nr. 397
ActDescription: A certain Giannetta Salvagi leases out the Russian slave Marta, who is 23 years of age, to a certain Giorgio de Carmo, revenditor raubarum, for 7 years 8 months and 70 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 23, series II, nr. 303
ActDescription: A certain Brigida Spinola leases out the Moorish slave Anna, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Benedetto de Via, setaiolo, for 15 years and 130 lire. The date is approximate.
A certain Francheta Grillo leases the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 32 years of age, to the notary Oberto Foglietta, for 13 years and 114 lire, 4 soldi, 8 denari.
A certain Stregino Salvagi leases out the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 22 years of age, to a certain ---, for 6 years and 50 lire. She is leased for the purpose of wet-nursing.

actTitle: Branca Bagnara, filza 1, series I, nr. 150
ActDescription: A certain Bartolomeo Cattaneo rents out the Tartaran slave Eliana, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Battista de Bargalio for two years at 20 lire per year.

A certain Ottobono Lomellini rents out the Bosnian slave Maria, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Girolamo de Canale, who is a silk-maker, for 12 years at a cost of 150 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed. This deed is coupled with n. 50 from the same series.

A certain Giovanni Spinola leases out the Moorish slave Maddalena, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Uberto de Magnasco, setaiolo, for 10 years and 100 lire. She is to be freed at the end of the lease.
A certain Niccolò Piccamiglio leases out the --- slave Maria, who is --- years old, to a certain Giovanni de Novi, for 12 years and 120 lire.

A certain Guglielmo Assereto, revenditor raubarum et iocalium, leases the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo de Uvada, lanaiolo, for 10 years and 70 lire. She is leased for the purpose of wet-nursing.

A certain Francesco Grimaldi leases out the Moorish slave Giorgino, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Gabriele de Pinu, calzolaio, for 4 years and 100 lire. She is to be freed at the end of the lease.
A certain Teramo Centurione rents out the Russian slave Micaela, who is 16 years of age, to a certain Paolo de Puteobonelo, for 6 years in return for 72 lire.
A certain Tommaso Grimaldi rents the Russian slave Caterina, who is 23 years old, to a certain Lorenzo Cacia, for 10 years and 120 lire.
A certain Giacomo da Passano leases out the Greek slave Lucia, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Antonio de Boianis, prete, for 10 years and 80 lire.

A certain Pellegro Salvago leases out the enslaved Bosnian slave woman named Lucia, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Bernardo de Luca, for 6 years and 120 Genoese lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Soldano Cattaneo rents out the Greek slave Margherita, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Raffaele de Marco, for 11 years at a cost of 96 lire.

actTitle: Niccolò de Coronato Pallavicini, filza 6, nr. 245
Girolamo Loggia, filza 4, series I, nr. 104
ActDescription: A certain Costantino Doria leases out the Moorish slave Caterina, who is 30 years old, to a certain Iacopo Domoculta, for 12 years and 100 lire. At the end of the term she is to be freed.

A certain Benedetto de Passano leases out the enslaved Albanian man named Calì, whose age is not indicated, to a certain Paolo Saluccio, seatarius, for 10 years and 100 lire. At the end of the contract he is to be freed.
A certain Paolo Cattaneo leases out the Tartaran slave Lucia, who is --- years of age, to a certain Niccolò di Rossano, for 33 months and 30 lire. She is to serve as a wet-nurse.

actTitle: Giacomo Rondanina, filza 7, series I, nr. 174
ActDescription: A certain Battista Cattaneo leases out the enslaved Russian woman named Caterina, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Antonio Carrega, quale nutrice, for one year and 20 Genoese lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 5, series II, nr. 9
ActDescription: A certain Federico Centurione rents out the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 22 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo de Ripalta, for 2 years and 40 lire.
A certain Benedetto Pinelli leases out the Moorish slave Maria, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Agostino de Illuminatis, for 8 years and 75 lire.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 13, series II, nr. 323
ActDescription: A certain Paolo Grillo setaiolo rents out the Russian slave Margherita, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Antonio de Maddalena cartarius for three years and 25 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 2, series I, nr. 273
ActDescription: A certain Lucano de Marini and Lodisio de Rocheta q. Cristoforo rents out the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 17 years of age, to a certain barber Giacomo de Bonis de Cassano q. Pietro, for 13 years and 95 lire.
A certain Filippo Gentile leases out the Moorish slave Maddalena, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Antonio Sesterio, calzolaio, for 12 years and 90 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Boveto, filza 2, series II, nr. 161
ActDescription: A certain Giacomo Celesia rents out the Tartaran slave Clara, who is 36 years of age, to a certain Pietro de Garono, cultelerius, for 2 years and 29 lire.
A certain Bartolomeo Ittaliano rents the Russian slave Caterina, who is 34 years of age, to a certain notary Lodisio de Brevei, for 12 years and 120 lire.

actTitle: Branca Bagnara, filza 8, series I, nr. 268
ActDescription: A certain Simone Calvi leases out the Abkhazan slave Caterina, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Guglielmo Lenza, barberius, for 12 years and 100 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 26, series II, nr. 48
ActDescription: A certain Simone Lercaro rents out the Bulgarian slave Margherita, who is 35 years of age, to a certain silk-maker Battista Pasagio, for 12 years at a price of 100 lire.
A certain Luchino Spinola leases out the Hungarian slave Calì, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Gaspare Lanfranco, for 8 years and 58 lire.
A certain Battista Palamide leases the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 45 years of age, to a certain Giriforte de Costa, drappiere, for 10 years and 95 lire.

A certain Battista de Palodio, procurator for the goods of the deceased Raffale Doria, leases out the Hungarian slave Maria, who is --- years of age, to a certain Alessandro Ravascherio, abbot of the monastery of San Andrea de Borzono, for 9 years and 95 lire.
A certain Antonio Dando leases out the Moorish slave Pellegrina, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Pietro Soler, from Barcelona, for 8 years and 20 ducats.

A certain Melchione de Gradi leases out the Circassian slave Cali, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Colombino de Campis, de Bobbio, for 11 years and 125 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 2, series I, nr. 322
ActDescription: A certain Benedetto de Leonardo q. Battista rents out (locatio) the Hungarian slave Margherita, who is 34 years of age, to a certain Milanese merchant Vincenzo de Rabiis d. Giacomo, for 6 years and 55 lire di «paghe».

actTitle: Tommaso Boveto, filza 2, series II, nr. 31
ActDescription: A certain Bartolomeo de Podio leases out the --- slave Maddalena, who is --- years of age, to a certain Lorenzo Grifo, from Pisa, for 2 years and --- lire, for the purpose of wetnursing. The lease occurs through a certain Guglielmo Assereto, sensale, for whom she is forced into prostitution for 15 days.
A certain Francesco Borromeo rents the Tartaran slave Cita, who is --- years old, from a certain Beltrame Forbino, from Marseille, for 6 years and --- lire.

A certain Francesco de Campenago, a merchant from Milan, rents out the Tartaran slave Asperto, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Venetian patron Lorenzo Raffono, for 6 years at a cost of 25 ducats.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 19, series II, nr. 141
ActDescription: In this deed, a certain Battista Spinola rents out the Bulgarian slave Maddalena, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Anechino da Bruges, revenditor raubarum, for 8 years at a price of 60 lire.
A certain Bartolomeo de Passano rents out the Hungarian slave Novella, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Lodisio Manuele, a merchant from Catalonia, for 2 years at a price of 30 lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 4, series II, nr. 99
ActDescription: A certain Antonio Usodimare rents out the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 21 years of age, to a certain Egidio Rois, from Catalonia, for 3 years at a cost of 30 lire. At the end of this period, she is to be freed.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 4, series I, nr. 362
ActDescription: A certain Accellino Gentile leases out the Abkhazan slave Agnese, who is 32 years of age, to a certain Andrea Cepula, for 6 years and 55 lire, for the purpose of wet-nursing.
A certain Galeotto Salvagi sub-leases out the --- slave Maddalena, who is --- years of age, to a certain Francesco Panario, from Valencia, for 5 years and 45 lire.

A certain Manfredo di Negro leases the Circassian enslaved Circassian woman named Maddalena, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Giacomo Fontana, for 7 years and 45 Genoese lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 5, series I, nr. 154
ActDescription: A certain Simone Lecavello rents out the Bulgarian slave Calì, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Giacomo de Niola, for 3 years at a price of 40 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 6, series II, nr. 190
ActDescription: A certain Antonio Carrega rents out the Circassian slave Giorgio, who is 25 years of age, for 6 years at a cost of 60 lire.
A certain Isolda de Montaldo rents out the Circassian slave Elena, who is 25 years of age, for 17 years and 170 lire. At the end of her service she is to be freed.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 4, series I, nr. 81
ActDescription: A certain Luchina Bonicane rents out the Tartaran slave Maria, who is 27 years of age, for the purpose of wet nursing (quale nutrice) to a certain Girolamo de Sancto Blaxio, for 3 years and 60L. The date is approximate.

actTitle: Branca Bagnara, filza 1, series II, nr. 150
ActDescription: A certain Battista Foglietta, notarius, leases the --- slave Caterina, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Girolamo de Savinione. The term is 3 years at a cost of 34 lire and 10 soldi.

actTitle: Giovanni Danove, filza 2, series II, nr. 156
ActDescription: A certain Giacomo de Arquata, cordonerius, rents out the Crimean (lazi) slave Caterina, who is 34 years of age, to a certain Antonio de Franchis for the purpose of wet-nursing (come balia), for three years and 60 lire. In the case of loss of milk, the rent is reduced to 10 lire per year.

A certain Barnaba Toiavacha de Buzala leases out the enslaved Russian woman named Maria, who is approximately 35 years of age, to a certain Niccolò Musso, from Savona, for 7 years and 40 Genoese lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 23, series II, nr. 49
ActDescription: I'm not certain if n. 49 is indeed the loan as indicated here. In this deed, a certain Martino de Coronato rents out the Albanian slave Pietro, who is 17 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo Palarmio, for 8 years at a price of 12 ducats.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 3, series II, nr. 136
ActDescription: A certain Antonio de Villanova q. Francesco rents out the Tartar woman Marta, who is 30 years of age, to Paolo Basadonna, legum doctor, for 5 years and 40L.
A certain Girolamo Calvi, draperius, rents the Russian slave Caterina, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Paolo Promontorio, for 2 years and 25- lire.

actTitle: Francesco Casanova, filza 2, series I, nr. 85
ActDescription: A certain Giacomo de Palodio leases out the enslaved Circassian woman named Simona, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Ambrogio Giustiniani, for three years and 50 lire. The lease is for the purpose quale nutrice.
A certain Giacomo “de Plebe” leases out the Abkhazan slave Caterina, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo de Franchi, for 6 years and 60 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 13, series II, nr. 46
ActDescription: A certain Giovanni Andra Murro rents out the Russian slave Elena, who is 31 years of age, to a certain Gregorio Cassana, for 3 years at a price of 50 lire.
A certain Ambrogio Zerbino leases out the Moorish slave Maria, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Bernardo Bullo, for 12 years and 100 lire.
A certain Guglielmo Maida leases out the --- slave Maddalena, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Benedetto de Franchis, for 9 years and a quantity of pine wood.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 5, series III, nr. 82
ActDescription: A certain Lodiso Paxerio, setaiolo, rents out the Tartaran slave Maddalena, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Blasio de Gradi, for 10 years and 90 lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 1, series III, nr. 92
ActDescription: A certain Bernardo Dala, from Catalonia, rents out the Circassian slave Agnese, who is 22 years of age, to a certain Francesco Giustiniani, for two years at a cost of 40 lire, for the pupose of being a wet nurse.
A certain Michele Boneto, from Catalonia, rents out the Greek slave Caterina, who is 18 years of age, to a certain a Antonio di Marco for 8 years and 45 lire.
A certain Nicola Barbaro rents the Circassian slave Scaramuccia, who is 24 years of age, to Pellegro de Gradis and Francesco de Gradis, for two years at a price of 17½ ducats.
A certain Nicola Barbaro rents the Circassian slave Scaramuccia, who is 24 years of age, to Pellegro de Gradis and Francesco de Gradis, for two years at a price of 17½ ducats.

A certain Cristoforo Guidice rents the Russian slave Caterina, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Bartolomea Imperiale, for 12 years and 120 lire. Note that Gioffrè mistakenly identifies this as belonging to filza 16.

actTitle: Lorenzo Costa, filza 8, series I, nr. 320
ActDescription: A certain Mariola Fieschi leases out the Mingrelian slave Margherita, who is 26 years of age, to Paride Fieschi, for 11 years and 110 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

A certain Bianchetta de Franchi, the daughter of Paolo and the wife of the deceased Andreolo Grillo, rents out the Russian slave Agnese, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Giacomo Anterio, revenditor raubarum, for 10 years at a cost of 100 lire.  The images are in the archive folder.
A certain Pietro Fieschi rents out the Circassian slave Maria, who is 32 years of age, to a certain Galeazzo de Levanto, for 16 years at a cost of 150 lire.
A certain Battista de Castiliono leases out the Moorish slave Giovanni, who is 16 years old, to a certain Luca Adorno, for 8 years and 60 lire.
A certain Barnaba de Sancto Blaxio rents out the Greek slave Maria, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Nicola de Cassana, for 11 years and 99 lire.
A certain Antonio de Franchis rents out the Circassian slave Valentino, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Genesio de Guizo, for 3 years at a price of 62 lire and 10 soldi.

Having already been leased for 7 years and 8 months for 84 lire 6 soldi 8 denari by Nicola Gentile Pallavicini to Raffaele "de Odono", Raffaele sub-leased the Hungarian slave Maria, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Paulo Sauli for 7 years and 2.5 months for 79 lire 16 soldi 8 denari.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 13, series I, nr. 77
ActDescription: A certain Luca de Fornari leases out the enslaved Tartaran woman named Lucia, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Giustiniani quondam Daniele, for 10 years and 115 lire. There are a number of conditions, and the enslaved Lucia is exchanged "talem qualem est".
A certain Giorgio de Franchis leases out the Tartaran slave Marta, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Battista Leone, for a period of 8 years and 44 lire.
A certain Giovanni Delfino rents out the Circassian slave Maria, who is 29 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo Ricobono, for 9 years at a cost of 80 lire.

Lorenzo Giustiniani leases out the Hungarian slave Maria, who is 33 years of age, to Gregorio de Beningassio, for 6 years. The notary indicates that the slave is pregnant. This is essentially a lease contract written up as a sale.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 1, series I, nr. 108
ActDescription: A certain Mariola Adorno rents the Wallachian slave Anna, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Raimondo Aimari, for 3 years and 25 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed (manumission).

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 7, series I, nr. 63
ActDescription: This deed is a sublocatio by Taddeo de Marini for the Circassian slave Maddalena, to Lodisio de Castilione, for 100 lire. I'm not certain how this type of transaction works... need to do more research here.

A certain Giacomo Spinola leases out the enslaved Bosnian slave named Anna, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Battista Sofia, for 12 years and 100 Genoese lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Battista Cibo rents out the Russian slave Elena, who is 34 years of age, to a certain Anasaldo Giustiniani, for 7 years at a price of 70 lire. At the end of the term she is to be freed.

actTitle: Lorenzo Costa, filza 7, series I, nr. 358
ActDescription: Brancaleone Doria q. Franco sells a 35-year old Hungarian slave to a certain Tommaso Frugone for 50L. After seven years she is to be freed. From Tria, p. 73: "Altra volta, poi, il venditore è presente, ma si stabilisce che il prezzo possa essere pagato a lui « sive legitime persone pro eo » "; .... p. 74-75: "Con molta precisione è anche determinata la figura del compratore. Così, di fronte agli atti in cui si vende al compratore ... sono la grande maggioranza quelli in cui si vende al compratore « presenti stipulanti et ementi pro se et heredibus et successoribus suis »... dove si trova la forma non usuale « presenti eiuenti ac acquirenti pro se et heredibus»..."
A certain Perrino Gentile leases out the --- slave Caterina, who is --- years of age, to a certain Cosma Tarigo for 5 years and 45 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

A certain Domenico Lercari leases out the enslaved woman named Catalina, whose age and nationality is not indicated, to a certain Girolamo Fieschi, for three years and 60 Genoese lire. She is leased for the purpose of wet nursing.
A certain Brunoro Spinola leases out the Abkhazan slave Lazzaro, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Girolamo Palmario, 9 years and 90 lire. The date is approximate.

Having already been leased for 7 years and 8 months for 84 lire 6 soldi 8 denari by Nicola Gentile Pallavicini to Raffaele de Odono, Raffaele sub-leased the Hungarian slave Maria, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Paulo Sauli for 7 years and 2.5 months for 79 lire 16 soldi 8 denari.
A certain Giorgio de Marini rents out the Circassian slave Maria, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Delfino, for 10 years and 100 lire.

A certain Manuele Usodimare rents out the Abkhazian slave Margherita, who is 36 years of age and pregnant, to a certain Antonio de Franchis, for 8 years at a cost of 86 lire, for the purpose of being a wet nurse.
A certain Nicola Spinola leases out the Moorish slave ---, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Andrea Valletaro, coperterius, for 5 years and 63 lire.
A certain Teramo Centurione leases out the --- slave Caterina, who is 35 years old, to a certain Francesco de Gradi, for 10 years and 100 lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 2, series II, nr. 353 (formerly nr. 348)
ActDescription: A certain Illario Grilla rents the Abkhazian slave Maria, who is 35 years old, to a certain Nicola de Fornari, for a period of 12 years for 100 lire. At the end of the rental period the slave is to be manumitted.

actTitle: Girolamo Loggia, filza 4, series I, nr. 355
ActDescription: A certain Bernardo Aucreto leases out the Abkhazan slave Caterina, who is 20 years old, to a certain Teodoro de Fornari, for 12 years and 120 lire.

actTitle: Girolamo Loggia, filza 1, series I, nr. 273
ActDescription: A certain Mariola de Turrilia, wife of the deceased Bartolmeo de Levante, leases out the enslaved Circassian named Maddalena, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Despina Centurione, for 12 years and 150 Genoese lire. Mariola is represented by the notary Lorenzo Costa.

actTitle: Giovanni Battista Parisola, filza 7, series II, nr. 109
ActDescription: A certain Gregorio Piccaluga leases out the Turkish slave Maria, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Bianca (Bianchineta) Cibo, for 12 years and 120 lire .
A certain Francesco Passagio, peliparius, leases out the Greek slave Lucia, who is 47 years of age, to a certain Luchina Spinola, for 4 years and 70 lire.

actTitle: Girolamo Loggia, filza 2, series II, nr. 372
ActDescription: A certain Mariola de Albingana leases the Circassian slave Maddalena, who is 45 years of age, to a certain Giuliano Grimaldi, for 9 years and 90 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

A certain Antonietta Bobello, from Varazze, wife of Luca Bertolino, leases out out the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 38 years of age, to a certain Girolamo Calvi, for 13 years and 3 luoghi in the Casa di San Giorgio.
A certain Battista de Bargalio, shoemaker, leases out the Tartaran slave Eliana, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Francesco Salvagi for 2 years and 40 lire. She is leased cum lacte.
A certain Girolamo de Monelia rents out the Moorish slave Caterina, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Matteo Lomellini, for 12 years at a cost of 120 lire.
A certain Antonio da Nove, doctor artium et medicine, leases out the Greek slave Margherita, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Soldano Cattaneo, for 12 years and 100 lire.

actTitle: Giovanni Danove, filza 2, series I, nr. 487
ActDescription: A certain notary Barolomeo de Canicia rents out the Russian slave Margherita, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Leonardo Garibaldi, for 15 years and 150 lire.

A certain Pietro de Rettalio, seatarius, leases out the enslaved Albanian woman named Melica, who is 36 years of age to a certain Gregorio Castagnola, for 10 years and 100 lire. At the end of the term she is to be freed.
A certain Giovanni de Vallebella, lanerius, leases out the Turkish slave Caterina, who is --- years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo Doria, for 6 years and 60 lire.

A certain Giovanni de Acurzo, represented by Pietro Giustiniani de Rocca, leases the Bulgarian slave Caterina, who is --- years of age, to a certain Raffaele Embriaco, for 8 years and 45 lire.  Raffaele agrees to provide her with food, shelter and clothes.
A certain Tomasino de Uncio, ex vasalis domini Georgii de Carreto, leases out the Moorish slave Lucia, who is --- years of age, to a certain Stefano Cicala, for 11 years and 121 lire.

actTitle: Lazzaro Raggi, filza 4, series II, nr. 355
ActDescription: A certain Vieto de Carmagnola, filotor septe, leases out the enslaved Circassian woman named Catalina, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Tobia Pinelli, for three years and 60 Genoese lire. The lease is for the purpose of wet nursing.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 2, series I, nr. 52
ActDescription: A certain Giovanni Costa de Sigresto leases the enslaved Maria, whose nationality is not indicated and who is 25 years of age, to a certain Luciano Grimaldi, for 2 years and 50 lire, for the purpose of wet nursing.

A certain Lodisio de Rocheta rents out the Circassian slave Margherita, who is 27 years of age, to a certain Girolamo Doria, for 2 years and a price of 40 lire. The slave is leased in order to hold, to keep, to possess, and use and profit... and to serve and be a slave (ad habendum, tenendum, possidendum et usufructuandum... et ad serviendum et famulandum) to the leaser. Chi loca si impegna a dimittere lo schiavo sin dal tempo stabilito ed a non auferre nec auferri consentire pensionem non augere et pacta non mutare, a legitime defendere, auctorizare et disbrigare a quacumque persona corporatione collegio et universitate expensis propriis a su stinere et subire atque terminari facere usque ad finem et deffinitivam sententiam inclusive et plenariam executionem a proprie spese omne iudicium omnemque litem che sorga in relazione agli schiavi.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 8, series II, nr. 225
ActDescription: A certain Bartolomeo de Poneta, cordoanerius, leases the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Cristoforo Panigarola, for 8 years and 100 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 14, series II, nr. 412 (formerly nr. 319)
ActDescription: A certain Marco Verrina, seatarius, rents the Russian slave Margherita, who is 32 years of age, to a certain Cipriano Spinola, for 3 years at a cost of 50 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 2, series II, nr. 261
ActDescription: A certain shoemaker Pietro de Camera rents the Hungarian slave Melica, who is 38 years of age, to the nobleman Brancaleone Doria, acting on behalf of Giovanni Francesco Spinola who is in Pisa, for 3 years and 60 lire.
A certain Francesco de Padino leases out the Abkhazan slave Marta, who is 32 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Doria, for 12 years and 100 lire.

hName: The nuns of the monastery of San Sepolcro di Sampierdarena
ActDescription: The sisters of the monastery of San Sepulcro rent out the enslaved Abkhazian woman named Lucia, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo Doria, for 13 years at a cost of 130 Genoese lire. She is to be freed at the end of the contract.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 25, series II, nr. 105
ActDescription: A certain Gabriele di Tolosa q. Dalmazio, from Barcelona, leases the Moorish slave Grazia, who is 37 years of age, to a certain Cristoforo Centurione, for 6 years and 45 lire.. At the end of the lease, Grazia is to be freed.

actTitle: Andrea Medianotte, filza 1, series I, nr. 112
ActDescription: A certain Aloiso de Maffeis, from Verona, leases the Tartaran slave Lucia, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Sebastiano di Negro, for 10 years at a cost of 60 lire.
A certain Francesco Giustiniani leases the Russian slave Teodora, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Sabrina Spinola, for 12 years and 120 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Domenico Cassana, draperius, leases out the Tartaran slave Maddalena, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Cesarina Dora, for 9 years and 50 lire.

A certain Teodolinda Fieschi leases the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Lorenzo di Negro, for 12 years and 120 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed. The date is approximate.
A certain Argentina Giustiniani, quondam Giacomo, the wife of Cosmo Pallavicini, leases out the Albanian slave ---, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Battista Spinola, for 5 years and 60 lire.

A certain Giovan Battista de Savignione leases out the Canary Islands slave Jachino, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Filippo Spinola, for 8 years and --- lire. There seems to be some confustion between the date reported by Gioffrè and the that specified in Pandetta 26 for the filza. Gioffrè does not provide a unit number, just the date of 3 sett. According to the Pandetta, filza 2 holds deeds written between 1478 and 1481. It may be just a mistake by G. (perhaps 1481?).

A certain Antonio de Strupa leases out the enslaved Circassian woman named Anna, who is 35 years old, to a certain Antonio Ittaliano, for five years and 75 Genoese lire, for the purpose of being a wet nurse (quale balia).

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 20, series II, nr. 45
ActDescription: A certain Inofio Sauli leases out the Bulgarian slave Anastasia, who is 16 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Antonio Spinola, for 8 years and 65 Venetian ducats. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Bartolomeo Campofregoso leases out the Abkhazan slave Lucia, who is 36 years of age, to a certain Antonio Calvi, for 6 years and 44 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Tommaso Boveto, filza 2, series III, nr. 90
ActDescription: A certain Percivalle Ardisone leases out the Greek slave Agnese, who is --- years of age, to a certain Guglielmo Assereto, for 10 years and 75 lire. The item number is approximate.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 13, series I, nr. 203
ActDescription: A certain Cristoforo Fornari leases out the Russian slave Giacobino, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Ilario Squarciafico, for 7 years and 80 lire.
A certain Alessandro de Franchis leases out the Moorish slave ---, who is 20 years of age, to a certain Teramo Centurione, for 8 years and 80 lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 4, series II, nr. 112
ActDescription: A certain Giacomo Maruffo rents out the slave Anastasia, whose ethnicity is not indicated and who is 28 years of age, to a certain Battista Centurione, for a period of three years and a cost of 50 lire.

actTitle: Giovanni Danove, filza 2, series I, nr. 578
ActDescription: A certain Francesco Maruffo rents out the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Battista Grimaldi, for 8 years and 90 lire.
A certain Davide de Amico, a doctor of law, rents out the Turkish slave Margherita, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Nicola Usodimare, for 4 years at a cost of 40 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 6, series II, nr. 46
ActDescription: A certain Tobia Lazario rents out the Abkhazan slave Margarita, who is 32 years of age, to a certain Constantino de Marini for 3 years and 60 lire, for the purposes of wet nursing.

actTitle: Cipriano Foglietta, filza 2, series II, item dated 1496-05-16
ActDescription: A certain Francesco de Franchis leases out the --- slave Maria, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Doria for 10 years and 100 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 13, series II, nr. 441
ActDescription: A certain Andrea Guizo leases out the Abkhazan slave Marta, who is 35 years old, to one Tommaso Spinola, for 6 years and 60 lire. The date and series number are tentative.

actTitle: Giovanni Danove, filza 3, series I, nr. 160
ActDescription: A certain Francesco Gambono rents out the Circassian slave Maddalena, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Girolamo Lomellini, for 15 years at a cost of 150 lire.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 14, series II, nr. 212
ActDescription: A certain Edoardo Promontorio leases out the Abkhazan slave Cristina, who is 36 years of age, to Cristoforo Doria, for 9 years and 85 lire, 10 soldi.
A certain Pietro Bordino rents out the --- slave Caterina, who is 45 years old, to a certain Giorgio Grimaldi, for 8 years and 100 lire.
A certain Lucia Spinola leases out the Abkhazan slave Maria, who is 22 years of age, to a certain Teodorina Spinola, for 20 years and 225 lire. At the end of the lease she is to be freed.

A certain Bartolomeo Centurione leases out the enslaved girl named Elena, whose nationality is not indicated and who is 8 years of age, to a certain Isabella Spinola, for 26 years and 25 gold ducats. The lease is “pro tale qualis est”. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 5, series I, nr. 212
ActDescription: A certain Francesco Spinola leases the slave Maddalena, who is --- years of age, to a certain sister Luchina Castagna, a nun of the Chiesa di Sant'Agata, for 3 years and 19 lire (locatio contract).
Having been rented out (locatio) for 10 years and for 120 lire by Cipriano Lomellini to Geneva Vivaldi, the Moorish slave Caterina, whose age is not indicated, is received by the lessor.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 13, series I, nr. 165
ActDescription: A certain Accellino Vivaldi rents out the Tartaran slave Melica, who is 34 years of age, to a certain Salvago Vivaldi, for 2 years and receives the income from 4 properties (or from 4 shares of San Giorgio?)
A certain Cipriano Lomellini rents out the Moorish slave Caterina, who is 34 years of age, to a certain Genevrina Vivaldi, for 10 years at a price of 120 lire.

actTitle: Girolamo Loggia, filza 1, series II, nr. 11
ActDescription: A certain Maria da Passano leases out the Albanian slave Caterina, who is 29 years of age, to a certain Stefano Gentile, for 10 years and 100 lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 5, series I, nr. 332
ActDescription: A certain Maria de Mari, wife of the deceased Demetrio Vivaldi, rents out the slave Maddalena, whose ethnicity and age are not indicated, to a certain Federico Centurione, for 4 years at a cost of 70 lire, for the purposes of being a wet nurse. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 5, series I, nr. 64
ActDescription: A certain Marietta Scotto leases out the Abkhazan slave Maddalena, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Spinola, for 15 years and 130 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 19, series II, nr. 32
ActDescription: A certain Violante Grimaldi rents out the Circassian slave Lucia, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Carlo Centurione, for 5 years and receives 50 lire.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 25, series II, nr. 93
ActDescription: A certain Mariola Grimaldi leases out the Abkhazan slave Maddalena, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Francesco Doria, for 8 years and 4 months, for 83 lire 10 soldi 8 denari.
A certain Oberto Ittaliano rents the Abkhazi slave Lazzarino, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Nicola Spinola. At the end of his service he is to be freed.

actTitle: Battista Muffola, filza 1, series I, nr. 266
ActDescription: A certain Ilario Squarciafìco leases out the enslaved Bosnian woman named Melica, who is 34 years of age, to a certain Tommaso Gentile, for 8 years and 80 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

A certain Cristoforo Spinola leases out the enslaved Moorish woman named Cita, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Edoardo Grillo, for 8 years and 80 Genoese lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Narino Montaldo, filza 1, series II, nr. 126
ActDescription: Megallo Lercari q. Novello sells an enslaved woman to Matteo Scipione for 60 lire. She is to be freed after 10 years of service.

A certain Raffaele Doria rents out the enslaved Albanian woman named Maria, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Nicola Piccamiglio, for 12 years and 125 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Girolamo Loggia, filza 2, series II, nr. 43
ActDescription: The --- slave Caterina, who is 32 years of age, having been leased for 16 years by Ottaviano Imperiale to the brothers Giovanni and Battista Piccamiglio, is freed by the curator of the inheritance of Ottaviano. (post locatio)
A certain Ottavio Imperiale rents out the Bosnian slave Caterina, who is 32 years of age, to a certain Battista Piccamiglio, for 16 years and 150 lire.  The images are in the archive folder.

actTitle: Girolamo Loggia, filza 2, series II, nr. 43
ActDescription: The --- slave Caterina, who is 32 years of age, having been leased for 16 years by Ottaviano Imperiale to the brothers Giovanni and Battista Piccamiglio, is freed by the curator of the inheritance of Ottaviano. (post locatio)

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 5, series II, nr. 154
ActDescription: In this deed, the former slave Maria, “olim serva” of Acelino Spinola “de Luccolo”, whose age and ethnicity is not indicated, is rented out for work on behalf of Valerano Cattaneo, olim Bustarino, for 6 years and 60 lire.
A certain Simone Lercari leases out the --- slave Maddalena, who is --- years of age, to a certain Galeotto Salvagi, for 15 years and 130 lire.

actTitle: Giovanni Danove, filza 2, series I, nr. 265
ActDescription: A certain Paolo Doria rents out the slave Giorgio, who is 18 years of age, as famulo si di una nave, to a certain Lorenzo Cattaneo, for 2.5 years and 50 lire.
A certain Martino Assereto leases out the Bosnian slave Maddalena, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Stefano Spinola, for 1 year and 12 lire.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 4, series I, nr. 302
ActDescription: A certain Andrea Vivaldi leases out the enslaved Abkhazan woman named Caterina, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Cosmo Salvago, for three years and 60 Genoese lire. She is leased for the purpose of wet-nursing (quale nutrice)

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 13, series I, nr. 445
ActDescription: A certain Cosma Spinola leases out the Moorish slave Andrea, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Aleramo Gentile, for 10 years and 60 lire. The date and series number are tentative.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 19, series I, nr. 215 (formerly nr. 251)
ActDescription: A certain Cosma Centurione rents out the Albanian slave Maria, who is 21 years of age, to a certain Francesco Centurione, for 8 years at a cost of 90 lire.
A certain Giacomo Spinola leases out the Greek slave Giorgio, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Antonio Cattaneo, for 4 years and 20 lire.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 2, series II, nr. 78
ActDescription: A certain Ottobono Imperiale rents out the ---  slave Lucia, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Niccolò Ittaliano, for 100 lire in paghe (shares) in San Giorgio.

actTitle: Tommaso Duracino, filza 27, series I, nr. 204
ActDescription: A certain Leonardo Cibo leases out the Moorsih slave Cita, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Nicola Panigarola, for 5 years and 58 lire.
A certain Galeoto de Nigro rents out the Circassian slave Margherita, who is 34 years of age, for 4 years at a cost of 40 lire.
A certain Martino de Calvi leases out the Bosnian slave Lucia, who is 25 years of age, to a Simoneto and Bernardino de Nicola da Calvi, for 14 years and 100 lire.
A certain Martino de Calvi leases out the Bosnian slave Lucia, who is 25 years of age, to a Simoneto and Bernardino de Nicola da Calvi, for 14 years and 100 lire.
Benedetto de Nigro rents the 32-year old slave Caterina (Risso does not indicate her origin) to Antonio Doria, for 9 years and 100L.
A certain Battista Cibo rents out the Hungarian slave Elena, whose age is not given, to a certain Leonardo de Nigro, for 3 years and 37 lire.
A certain Gaspare de Marini leases the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Paolo Gentile, for 3 years and 55 lire.
A certain Edoardo Grillo leases the Circassian slave Maddalena, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Giovanni Centurione, for 12 years and 120 lire.

actTitle: Giovanni Danove, filza 2, series I, nr. 404
ActDescription: A certain Giovanni Usodimare rents out the Circassian slave Margherita, who is 38 years of age, to a certain Medialuce Cicala, for 10 years at a cost of 100 lire.
A certain Anfreone Usodimare rents out the Albanian slave Maddalena, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Stefano Cicala, for 9 years at a price of 110 lire.
A certain Gregorio Castagnola leases out the Circassian slave Melica, who is 40 years of age, to a certain Daniele Spinola, for 12 years and 30 gold ducats.
A certain Raffaele Salvagi leases the Russian slave Marta, who is 45 years of age, to a certain Stefano Spinola, for 7 years and 70 lire. At the end of the term she is to be liberated.
A certain Agostino Lasagna rents out the Circassian slave Maria, who is 29 years of age, to a certain Andriola Spinola, for 7 years at a cost of 70 lire.
A certain Battistina Crescia rents out the slave Maria, who is 32 years of age and whose ethnicity is not indicated, to a certain Paolo Lomellini, for 6 years at a cost of 60 lire.

actTitle: Lorenzo Costa, filza 3, series I, nr. 368
ActDescription: A certain Giovanni de Natino leases out the enslaved Bosnian woman named Elena, who is 26 years of age, to a certain Girolamo Vento, for 18 years and 70 gold ducats. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

A certain Antonio de Natino rents out the enslaved Greek woman named Elena, whose age is not indicated, to a certain Francesco Lomellini, for 10 years at a price of 70 Genoese lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Pietro --- leases out the Albanian slave Calì, who is 30 years of age, to a certain Francesco Cibo, for 10 years and 100 lire.

actTitle: Girolamo Loggia, filza 2, series I, nr. 77
ActDescription: A certain Nicola Marcone leases out the Hungarian slave Caterina, who is 35 years of age, to a certain Tommaso Doria for 9 years and 100 lire. The item number is approximate.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 15, series I, nr. 156
ActDescription: This deed describes a rental of the Tartaran slave Lucia, who is 22 years of age, to a member of the Lomellini family, for 9 years at a cost of 10 lire per year. Gioffrè indicates, I think, that the names may be unreadable or not given. Look into this item at the archives.

actTitle: Giovanni Valdettaro, filza 1, series II, nr. 30
ActDescription: A certain Battista de Monsia leases out the enslaved Bulgarian woman named Lucia, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Battista Carena, for 15 years and 150 Genoese lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
A certain Melchione de Monleone rents out the Russian slave Maria, who is 15 years of age, to the brothers Bartolomeo and Pietro Oroboni, for 4 years and 40 lire.
A certain Melchione de Monleone rents out the Russian slave Maria, who is 15 years of age, to the brothers Bartolomeo and Pietro Oroboni, for 4 years and 40 lire.

actTitle: Bartolomeo Risso, filza 5, series II, nr. 23
ActDescription: A certain shoemaker Paolo Giusto rents out the Circassian slave Brigida, who is 24 years of age, to a certain Filippo Auroge, for 7 years at a cost of 60 lire.

hName: Violante, the wife of Giovanni de Valencia
ActDescription: Violante, the wife of a certain Giovanni de Valencia, leases ou the --- slave Margarita, to a certain Giovanni Boecio, for 3 years and 60 lire. She is leased cum lacte with the stipulation that the risk of a possible lack of milk should lie with the lessee Giovanni.
A certain Isabella Giustiniano leases out the Abkhazan slave Maddalena, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Giuliano ---, for 14 years and 150 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Giovanni Danove, filza 2, series I, nr. 341
ActDescription: A certain Salvagia Doria, widow of the deceased Pietro Grillo leases out the enslaved Circassian woman named Maria, who is approximately 33 years of age, to a certain Rainaldo Lorentelli, for 12 years and 120 Genoese lire. Rainaldo agrees to return the enslaved Maria in good health and without any illness.
A certain Antonio de Carretto rents the Russian slave Maddalena, who is 25 years of age, to a certain Bartolomeo de Liguoris, for 7 years and 90 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.

actTitle: Egidio Damezzano, filza 1, series I, nr. 167
ActDescription: A certain Salvagi Grimaldi rents out the Tartaran slave Maria to a certain Leonardo Casandra, for 8 years and 50 lire.
A certain Pellegro Salvagi rents out the Moorish slave Maria, who is --- years of age, to a certain Domenico de Serranano, for 10 years at a cost of 50 ducats.
A certain Oberto, whose last name is not specified, leases the Russian slave Anna, who is 28 years of age, to a certain Isabella, whose last name is also not specified, for 10 years and 75 lire.

actTitle: Antonio Fazio, filza 15, series II, dated 1454-02-12
ActDescription: A certain Giorgio --- leased out out the Circassian slave Caterina, who is 18 years of age, to a certain Raffaele, for 3 years. She is to work as a wet-nurse. In exchange he receives a Tartaran slave in compensation.

actTitle: Lorenzo Costa, filza 3, series II, nr. 228
ActDescription: The Russian slave Anatasia, who is 33 years of age, is leased for 13 years and 125 lire. At the end of the contract she is to be freed.
